item.description: In the last years I always had some kind of pc hooked up to my tv. I finally got around to have the time (and money) to build a dedicated system. Not all the parts are new, just that I had enough spares and money for the case: Antec Fusion Remote 350 mini HTPC case. Gigabyte GA-MA78GPM-DS2H mini ATX socket AM2 motherboard. Western Digital 1Tb, Green AMD 4850E dual core, energy efficient processor.
